in.tamchow.fractal.helpers.math

Class BaseConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.tamchow.fractal.helpers.math.BaseConverter

  • public final class BaseConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts a number in digit representation from one base to another Not guaranteed to work with bases above 65,451 (more characters than which the lookup can use for substituting digits)
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Tamoghna Chowdhury
